title: Scenario-Based Online Education for Enhancing Interprofessional Collaboration in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Experiencing real-world medical simulations through learner interaction and role-playing

learning_goals: Learners can analyze collaboration scenarios among four or more professional roles (physician, nurse, physical therapist, speech-language pathologist) and evaluate each role’s contribution.
Learners successfully complete 80% or more of interdependent tasks with team members in virtual cases reflecting real medical situations.
Learners understand other professionals’ workflows and communication methods through online discussions and write three or more improvement proposals.

resources: LMS Platform (Video Conferencing, Discussion Board, Assignment Submission Features)
Digital Role-Play Resources (Case Cards, Protocol Templates)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
